name: Find youself (coursera training project)
description:
Basis of this game is Super-Stranaut game from Coursera`s "Game Design and Development" course.

My modifications are:
1) add mushroom script and mushroom game object. If player eat this, he becoming big and fast or overwise - downgrade to normal.

2) game consist 3 unique levels (mushrooms only on the last).

3) add myself background in-game music. Made in FL Studio.

4) add rotation script and slightly  mutate main menu screen)

Good Luck / Have Fun

Created by Alexey Kolmakov
